Module.Content:
<html>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
      href="https://table-tennis-scoreboard.googlecode.com/git/css/style.css" />
<head>
	<title>Ping Pong</title>
	<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset = iso-8859-1" />
</head>

<body>
<script src="//plus.google.com/hangouts/_/api/v1/hangout.js"></script>
<script src="https://hangoutmediastarter.appspot.com/static/html5slider.js"></script>






<script>
var CANVAS_WIDTH = 640;
var CANVAS_HEIGHT = 360;

function updateMirroring() {
  var val =  document.querySelector('#mirror-checkbox').checked;
  gapi.hangout.av.setLocalParticipantVideoMirrored(val);
}

function init() {
  gapi.hangout.onApiReady.add(function(eventObj) {
    console.log("everything ready");
  });
  gapi.hangout.av.setLocalParticipantVideoMirrored(false);
}
gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(init);
</script>

<script src="https://table-tennis-scoreboard.googlecode.com/git/js/scoreboard.js">
</script>
<script src="https://table-tennis-scoreboard.googlecode.com/git/js/chronometer.js">
</script>
<script src="https://table-tennis-scoreboard.googlecode.com/git/js/gtvlogo.js">
</script>
<script src="https://table-tennis-scoreboard.googlecode.com/git/js/main.js">
</script>
